title: Remove an ad from On-chain Ads (content moderation)
description: Someone requested to remove an ad from On-chain Ads (content moderation)

descriptions: Select this if you think the ad does not comply with the required criteria and should be removed.
Select this if you think the ad complies with the required criteria and should not be removed.

question: Does the ad comply with the required criteria?

metadata.tcrDescription: A list of smart contract addresses that hold ads in the form of SVG data returned as base64
